Control Name: Maintain strict control over the internal or external distribution of any kind of media, including the following:\nSend the media by secured courier or other delivery method that can be accurately tracked.

control_attributes.Control: Maintain strict control over the internal or external distribution of any kind of media, including the following:\nSend the media by secured courier or other delivery method that can be accurately tracked.
control_attributes.Requirement: 9.6.2. Restrict physical access to cardholder data
